verbose_text: Addition of Si to the NaCl containing medium enhanced shoot regeneration and growth of A. multiflora by altering activity of antioxidant enzymes, maintenance of ultra structure of stomata, and limiting NaCl deposition in leaves.
evidence: Si to the NaCl containing medium enhanced shoot regeneration and growth of A. multiflora by altering activity of antioxidant enzymes, maintenance of ultra structure of stomata, and limiting NaCl
